text: Casnate con Bernate is a comune (municipality) in the Province of Como in the Italian region Lombardy, located about 30 km north of Milan and about 5 km south of Como. As of 1 January 2009, it had a population of 4,850 and an area of 5.3 kmÂ².All demographics and other statistics: Italian statistical institute Istat. Casnate con Bernate borders the following municipalities: Como, Cucciago, Fino Mornasco, Grandate, Luisago, Senna Comasco. == Demographic change == Colors= id:lightgrey value:gray(0.9) id:darkgrey
